title: Tomlin steps down; not expected to coach in '26
content: Mike Tomlin has stepped down as Steelers coach, ending a 19-year run in Pittsburgh during which he never had a losing season.

title: Mavs' Davis won't have surgery; out six weeks
content: After a second opinion with a specialist, Mavericks star Anthony Davis will not require surgery to his injured hand and will be reevaluated in six weeks.

title: Sources: Mets offer Tucker in $50M AAV ballpark
content: Free agent outfielder Kyle Tucker has been offered a short-term deal by the Mets that is believed to be worth $50 million per season, sources told ESPN.

title: Bryson, Rahm, Smith pledge commitments to LIV
content: LIV Golf League captains Bryson DeChambeau, Cameron Smith and Jon Rahm said Tuesday that they're not planning to follow Brooks Koepka back to the PGA Tour.

title: Sources: Oregon TE Sadiq to declare for NFL draft
content: Oregon tight end Kenyon Sadiq, Mel Kiper's No. 1-ranked player at the position, will leave the program early to declare for the NFL draft, sources told ESPN's Pete Thamel on Tuesday, after a season in which he caught 51 passes for 560 yards for the Ducks.

title: Sources: Freeman to stay at ND despite NFL jobs
content: Marcus Freeman is expected to remain the head coach at Notre Dame in 2026 despite interest from several NFL teams, sources told ESPN.

title: Supreme Court takes up transgender athlete cases
content: The Supreme Court got complex arguments and passionate demonstrations as it considered two cases related to transgender athletes.

title: Ravens owner eyeing new deal for Lamar by March
content: Baltimore Ravens owner Steve Bisciotti told reporters Tuesday that he's told star quarterback Lamar Jackson he wants a new deal done by the start of free agency in March, one that would significantly lower the two-time NFL MVP's $74.5 million cap number.

content: As teams shy away from dealing first-rounders, which trades have been the biggest successes and utter failures?

title: Bloomington unofficially names pond in Indiana DB D'Angelo Ponds' honor
content: The retention pond is a short walk away from Memorial Stadium and was renamed after the Indiana Hoosiers defensive back following suggestions on social media.

title: Fantasy basketball pickups: McConnell, Watson, Nurkic among top players to add
content: Every week in fantasy basketball, there are available players who can help fill holes in your roster. Here are the ones to add for the week ahead.

title: 'Strong action': Trump warns Iran against 'hanging' protestors
content: US President Donald Trump issued a stern warning to Iran, vowing strong action if authorities proceed with executions amid widespread protests.  Trump stated that the US would respond forcefully if hangings commence, emphasizing that killing thousands of people would have severe consequences for Iran. He also indicated that the US is monitoring the situation closely and will act accordingly.

title: After Sabarimala gold theft, Rs 35L ‚Äòghee scam‚Äô under lens
content: The Kerala High Court has ordered a vigilance probe into alleged misappropriation of over Rs 35 lakh from the sale of leftover ghee at Sabarimala. The court directed the vigilance director to form a team and register a crime based on a report highlighting discrepancies in fund remittance from ghee packet sales. A progress report is due within a month.

title: Ajit Pawar rules out merger talks with Sharad Pawar, denies BJP ‚Äòmatch-fixing‚Äô
content: Deputy CM Ajit Pawar indicated a potential reunion with his uncle Sharad Pawar, stating he believes in "addition, not subtraction" in politics. He admitted that the bitterness between the two NCP factions has subsided following their alliance for the Pune and Pimpri-Chinchwad civic polls, making the contest against the BJP tighter.

title: 'Immediately sever all contact': After US, Israel withdraws from several UN agencies
content: Israel is severing ties with several UN agencies and international bodies, citing persistent bias and hostile actions. This decision follows a review prompted by the US withdrawal from similar organizations. The affected bodies include UN Women and the UN Conference on Trade and Development, with specific grievances cited regarding children in conflict and sexual violence allegations.

title: 'Consistent': Why Virat has always stayed ahead of Rohit in ODIs ‚Äî ex-India batter explains
content: Mohammad Kaif attributes Virat Kohli's ODI dominance over Rohit Sharma to his exceptional mindset and ability to convert starts into match-winning scores. Kaif highlighted Kohli's self-awareness and relentless standards, even after a significant knock. Kohli's recent fifty-plus streak in ODIs is also noted, bringing him closer to a new Indian record.

title: ‚ÄòAre You Dead?‚Äô app goes viral: Tops China‚Äôs app store; Why iPhone users worldwide are spending on it
content: A new app, 'Are You Dead?', is gaining immense popularity among solo dwellers in China and India, addressing rising safety concerns. Users check in every two days; failure to do so alerts a pre-selected emergency contact. This paid app, also known as 'Demumu' internationally, offers peace of mind for those living alone.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens below 25,700; BSE Sensex down over 100 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the equity benchmark indices, started Wednesday on a negative note, slipping in trade. While Nifty50 was near 25,650, BSE Sensex was down over 120 points.

title: 'Ready to induct women in infantry if there is societal acceptance': Army chief
content: The Indian Army is prepared to integrate women into infantry roles, contingent on societal readiness, Army Chief General Upendra Dwivedi stated. He emphasized gender neutrality and uniform standards, noting a sequential induction into combat roles. The Army is also undergoing significant modernization, focusing on drone capabilities, advanced weaponry, and self-reliance in ammunition for future warfare.

title: Amazon's RTO gets stricter: Managers tracking hours; three types of employees under scanner
content: Amazon is now closely monitoring office attendance, tracking not just presence but also exact hours spent by corporate employees. This escalation in surveillance, revealed by an internal document, flags 'Low-Time Badgers' and 'Zero Badgers' who don't meet in-office expectations. The move follows a strict five-day return-to-office mandate, with similar tracking systems emerging at tech rivals like Samsung and Dell.

title: Explained: How Elon Musk's Starlink became Iran protesters‚Äô lifeline as internet blackout deepens
content: Iran's internet shutdowns during protests are being circumvented by SpaceX's Starlink satellite service. Despite being illegal, terminals enter the country via informal channels, offering a lifeline for communication and information sharing. Authorities attempt to jam signals and locate devices, leading to a constant technological battle, while legal risks for users escalate.

title: 'Don't give up, stay ready': KL Rahul's message to young cricketers
content: Ahead of the second ODI against New Zealand, KL Rahul shared valuable advice with budding cricketers, emphasising patience and perseverance. He urged youngsters to trust the process, continuously work on themselves, and be ready to seize opportunities when they arise. Rahul highlighted that difficult phases are common for all players and stressed the importance of not giving up.

title: Indore contaminated water crisis: A fortnight later, govt admits 15 deaths
content: The Madhya Pradesh government has grimly confirmed that a diarrhoea outbreak in Indore has led to 15 tragic deaths linked to pollution of drinking water. Findings from a study by Mahatma Gandhi Medical College doctors have sparked further scrutiny into the circumstances surrounding these cases.

title: AI infrastructure debate: Amazon founder on private data centres; ‚ÄòJust plug into the grid‚Äô
content: Jeff Bezos criticizes the current trend of companies building private AI data centers, comparing it to early 20th-century factories generating their own electricity. He predicts a shift towards centralized cloud services like AWS for greater efficiency and scale, as AI's massive energy demands become a significant bottleneck for the industry.

title: Happy Makar Sankranti 2026: Top 70+ wishes, messages, greetings and quotes to share
content: Makar Sankranti, a solar calendar festival, marks the Sun's northward journey, symbolizing change, warmth, and new beginnings. Celebrated across India with various names, it fosters joy and gratitude. The article offers a collection of wishes, messages, and quotes to share, strengthening bonds and spreading positivity during this auspicious occasion.

title: Budget 2026 for defence: Why capital outlay should be hiked for ‚ÄòAtmanirbharta‚Äô
content: Budget 2026 for defence: According to FICCI, enhancing defence spending is essential with a higher capital outlay within a steadily rising defence budget and a significant boost in funding for DRDO to accelerate modernisation and indigenous technology development.

title: NEET-PG cut-off score now fixed at -40 out of 800
content: Government has significantly reduced NEET-PG cut-offs to fill over 9,000 vacant medical postgraduate seats. Percentiles for general, EWS, SC, ST, and OBC candidates have been lowered, some to zero. This move aims to prevent wastage of training capacity amidst a doctor shortage and follows a plea from the Indian Medical Association.

title: Vanessa Bryant recalls Kobe Bryant‚Äôs iconic footwork vs Charlotte Hornets
content: Vanessa Bryant continues to honor her late husband, Kobe Bryant, by sharing cherished memories. Recently, she posted a throwback clip of Kobe's incredible 2008 dunk against the Charlotte Hornets, highlighting his 'Mamba Mentality.'  She also expressed gratitude on behalf of the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation for the support enabling opportunities for young athletes.

title: Justin Rose and Kate Phillips net worth timeline from 2016 to 2026
content: Justin Rose and his wife Kate Phillips have built a combined net worth estimated at $50‚Äì$60 million by 2026, driven by Rose‚Äôs sustained PGA Tour success, endorsements, and long-term investments. Their wealth has grown steadily over a decade, reflecting consistent performance, careful financial planning, and ongoing involvement in business and philanthropy.

title: Aaron Rodgers accused of emotional abuse by ex Danica Patrick amid wife mystery
content: Aaron Rodgers' marriage and wife, Brittani, continues to be a mystery even after the two have been reportedly been married for more than half a year. Amid all the mess, Aaron Rodgers' ex, Danica Patrick, has made controversial claims against the NFL veteran about the relationship the two shared for over two years. Aaron Rodgers continues to stay distant from all the drama.

title: 'Dhurandhar' scores highest week 6 collections
content: Ranveer Singh and Akshaye Khanna's spy thriller 'Dhurandhar' continues its phenomenal run, now surpassing Rs 810 crore nett. The film has achieved the highest Week 6 collections ever for a Hindi movie, adding another record to its impressive theatrical journey. Its sustained momentum is a testament to its widespread appeal.

title: Is he better now? After TOI report, Kumar Sanu reaches out to Bhopal man who attempted suicide
content: Legendary singer Kumar Sanu was moved by a report of a fan's suicide attempts and personally reached out to offer support. After learning the fan was hospitalized in Patna, Sanu spoke with the fan's father, expressing his sadness and praying for recovery. The singer's team also sought updates on the fan's condition.

title: Top stocks to buy today: Stock recommendations for January 14 - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Mehul Kothari of Anand Rathi Shares and Stock Brokers recommends buying SJVN, JSW Energy, and Rail Vikas Nigam Ltd. as top stock picks for today.

title: ‚ÄòStruck him repeatedly on head, face with hammer‚Äô: Wife, her lover butcher man in UP
content: Police in Bareilly have arrested a 30-year-old wife and her 26-year-old lover for the hammer murder of her husband. The couple allegedly conspired to kill the 50-year-old farmer after he discovered their three-year affair and objected to it. The wife held him down while her lover struck him with a hammer.

title: Kohli, Rohit discuss '27 ODI WC plans with Gambhir? Batting coach reveals details
content: "They definitely make plans. Now that they're playing only one format, they want India to win everywhere when they are there," Kotak said on the eve of India‚Äôs second ODI against New Zealand.

title: MLB trade rumor: Yankees eye Ryan Weathers for pitching help amid injuries
content: The New York Yankees have bolstered their pitching staff by acquiring left-handed pitcher Ryan Weathers from the Miami Marlins. This move addresses depth concerns for the upcoming season. In exchange, the Yankees sent four promising young position players to Miami. Weathers brings team control and potential to the Yankees' rotation.

title: Nvidia AI chips in China! US approves sale of H200 chips, with strict limitations
content: The US Commerce Department has signaled a policy shift, approving Nvidia to export its H200 AI chips to China under strict conditions. This move allows for case-by-case licensing reviews instead of automatic rejections for these advanced processors, though the most cutting-edge chips remain off-limits.

title: Pakistan‚Äôs embarrassment in BBL: After Rizwan retired out, Ali also errs ‚Äì Watch
content: Pakistan players endured further embarrassment in the Big Bash League as Hasan Ali‚Äôs misfield gifted a boundary during Adelaide Strikers‚Äô loss to Melbourne Stars, just a day after Mohammad Rizwan became the first overseas player to be retired out. Tom Curran‚Äôs career-best spell then helped the Stars bowl Strikers out for 83 and seal an easy win.

title: Pune lab confirms Nipah in 2 samples, both nurses critical
content: In Bengal, two nurses have tested positive for the Nipah virus and are currently in critical condition. One individual close to them has shown mild fever symptoms. Over 120 potential contacts are now under home isolation, as health officials continue their tracing efforts.

title: Happy Makar Sankranti: 75+ heartfelt messages, greetings, wishes, and quotes for 2026
content: Makar Sankranti is one of the most prominent festivals of India. This day has religious, spiritual, and cultural significance. A harvest festival, Makar Sankranti is celebrated across India in different names. The sun God is worshipped on this day and is offered newly harvested grains. It is also a day to wish family and friends and people often come together to celebrate.

title: 'The Raja Saab' Box Office collection day 5: Prabhas film slows down further
content: Prabhas's 'Raja Saab' is facing a significant box office downturn, with collections plummeting after its initial days. Day 5 saw a meager Rs 4.85 crore, bringing the total to Rs 119.45 crore. Low occupancy across languages and overwhelmingly negative audience reviews citing poor storytelling and performances are contributing to the film's struggle, despite its star-studded cast.

title: Erika Kirk faces backlash for attending Peach Bowl alone as fans debate parenting
content: Erika Kirk faced online criticism after attending the Peach Bowl in Atlanta without her children on January 10, 2025. Social media users questioned her choices following the death of her husband, Charlie Kirk. While many criticized her parenting, others defended her, saying grief is personal. Erika has not responded to the backlash.

title: On govt nudge, quick commerce firms dropping 10-min promise; what experts have to say
content: In a bid to prioritize safety for delivery partners, government officials are advocating for quick commerce companies to abandon their '10-minute' delivery claims. Notably, Blinkit and Instamart have already taken a step in this direction, and more companies are expected to follow suit. This initiative seeks to enhance working conditions for gig workers while maintaining flexible delivery timeframes.

title: 'My superhero': Claire Kittle stands by George after injury update
content: George Kittle's wife, Claire Kittle, has always been spotted cheering on her husband and being there for him through all the tough times. While fans panic over George Kittle's absence from the field in the upcoming matches due to his brutal injury, the star player has shared a heartbreaking update about his injury. His wife, Claire Kittle's response to it has moved fans.

title: Iran's crackdown: ‚ÄòRegime is on a killing spree' ‚Äì eyewitnesses recount brutality
content: Iran is witnessing its deadliest crackdown in over a decade, with reports of around 2,000 deaths amid a communications blackout. Security forces have allegedly used lethal force against largely unarmed protesters, resulting in severe injuries. Hospitals are overwhelmed, and authorities are reportedly detaining injured individuals. Despite the brutal repression, defiance persists.

title: Mike Tomlin net worth: Steelers coach salary, contracts, and earnings
content: Mike Tomlin's consistent success with the Pittsburgh Steelers since 2007 has solidified his net worth at an estimated $30 million by 2025. His recent three-year contract extension, valued at approximately $50 million through the 2027 season, makes him one of the NFL's highest-paid coaches. This long-term commitment underscores the team's unwavering trust in his leadership.

title: Former Minister and INLD leader Sampat Singh accuses Haryana govt of neglecting the education sector in budgets over the years
content: According to the latest education department report, 40,671 posts of school teachers out of the sanctioned 1,22,359 posts were vacant at present, he said

title: Five new diarrhoea cases detected in Indore; no clarity over 'death audit' report
content: A total of 436 patients were admitted to hospitals since the vomiting and diarrhoea outbreak, triggered by supply of contaminated drinking water in the locality on December 29, of which 403 were discharged after recovery

title: 170 years ago, a debate in Britain parliament on torture in Madras
content: Forms of torture in Madras Presidency at the time included tying a man by the hair of his head to the tail of an ass, and parading him though the public market

title: A plea for Pachaiyappa‚Äôs Hall in Chennai
content: With the trust that owns it mostly in the news for legal squabbles, precious little seems to be done about this historic edifice

content: Singh‚Äôs decision comes after a request from Madhya Pradesh Congress SC Department President Pradeep Ahirwar, who urged him to make way for an SC community representative

Karunanidhi‚Äôs remark on Ram Setu, Vishwa Hindu Parishad (VHP) leader and former BJP MP Ram Vilas Vedanti triggered a major controversy in September 2007 by saying that ‚Äúwhosoever chopped off the head and tongue of the DMK president would be gifted in gold.‚Äù

content: Approves draft agreement to be signed between Bihar and Jharkhand; the move will further strengthen irrigation facility in eight districts of Bihar

title: Siddaramaiah accuses BJP of dismantling MGNREGA, says party has ‚Äòallergy‚Äô to Mahatma Gandhi
content: The Karnataka Chief Minister alleged that the new framework shifted financial burdens to States and diluted panchayat-level planning

title: What an edible insects stall revealed about acceptance, ‚Äònormal‚Äô food
content: Despite their nutritional and environmental benefits, people are increasingly moving away from insect-based foods. Urbanisation has created both physical and cultural distance from such practices. Many younger generations that have grown up or settled in cities are often unaware that insects are eaten across several parts of India

title: Won‚Äôt allow Assembly polls if SIR is obstructed in WB, says State BJP president
content: The BJP leader said that party workers had held protests at various places in the State after the officials refused to accept the objection forms by the party

title: Rahul Gandhi holds discussions with Siddaramaiah, Shivakumar separately at Mysuru airport
content: The interactions have drawn attention as the issue of leadership and power-sharing continues to be discussed publicly

title: From ganja to gold: Odisha Police trace ‚Çπ10 crore assets from two persons in backward district
content: Investigators revealed that one of the two ganja traders had built assets worth over ‚Çπ5 crore, allegedly shown as earnings from a roadside dhaba opened just two years ago

title: Tesla to offer a fortnight-long pop-up in Bengaluru, starting January 15
content: The pop-up will feature four Tesla Model Y and customers will be able to learn about Tesla‚Äôs design philosophy, cutting-edge electric vehicle technology, safety features, and performance capabilities in an interactive environment

title: I&B Ministry collaborates with Netflix for project
content: The ‚ÄúInspiring Innovators-Naye Bharat Ki Nayi Pehchaaan‚Äù is a skilling initiative that brings together India‚Äôs innovation and creative ecosystems to promote socially relevant innovation, said the Ministry

title: Nitin Nabin to be formally elected BJP president on January 20
content: All Chief Ministers and Deputy Chief Ministers of BJP-ruled States as well as State unit presidents and national office-bearers have been asked to be present in Delhi for the nomination

title: J&K Muslim bodies express concern over ‚Äòpolice profiling' of mosques
content: Political and Muslim religious leaders describe move to seek details of mosques, its ideology and caretakers  as ‚Äòintrusive‚Äô and ‚Äòthreatening‚Äô

title: Governor‚Äôs Rule in Mizoram tribal council extended for 6 months
content: On January 7, the State Cabinet said there was no justification for extending Governor‚Äôs Rule in the Chakma Autonomous District Council

title: Aditya Sahu set to become Jharkhand BJP president
content: Mr. Sahu will replace Babulal Marandi, who is currently serving as Leader of Opposition in Jharkhand Legislative Assembly

title: Prime Minister Modi to address public meeting in city on Jan. 23
content: The public meeting will be organised in a grand manner, in which AIADMK leaders, including the party general secretary and the NDA‚Äôs Chief Ministerial face Edappadi K. Palaniswami, and leaders from other alliance parties will share the stage with Mr. Modi

title: The UDF‚Äôs ray of hope in an uphill battle in Kerala
content: Kerala local body poll results give the Congress-led United Democratic Front momentum, but Assembly polls could be challenging

title: Mumbai set for high-stakes battle as campaigning for 29 civic body elections ends
content: Roadshows, door-to-door meetings dominate the day ahead of polls tomorrow; all eyes on country‚Äôs richest civic body, BMC; SEC declares polls to 12 zila parishads, 125 panchayat samitis to be held on Feb. 5

title: Tamil Nadu close to eradicating malaria as 33 districts report nil indigenous cases
content: Chennai is among the five districts that are yet to achieve zero transmission, accounting for nearly 37%-45% of the State‚Äôs malaria cases, even as the number has fallen from 173 in 2023 to 121 in 2025

title: Equality in society has to start in school, says Supreme Court
content: A Bench headed by Justice P.S. Narasimha elaborated that the obligation of the government under the Right to Education Act (RTE) to ensure that neighbourhood schools admit children belonging to weaker and disadvantaged sections has an ‚Äúextraordinary capacity to transform the social structure of our society‚Äù

title: Iran To Hang Anti-Khamenei Protesters, Trump Warns Of "Very Strong Action"
content: US President Donald Trump has encouraged Iranians to keep protesting, saying, 'Help is on its way," amid a bloody crackdown, which, according to activists, claimed at least 2,000 lives.

title: "F*** You": Trump Flips Off Heckler Who Calls Him "Pedophile Protector"
content: US President Donald Trump was caught on camera Tuesday responding obscenely to a heckler during a visit to an auto plant in Michigan, according to a video circulating on social media.

title: "Bureaucratic Mess": Team Trump Told To Issue Visa To Student Deported To Honduras
content: A US federal judge urged the Trump administration to resolve a "bureaucratic mess" by issuing a student visa to a college student who was deported to Honduras after being arrested at Boston's airport while trying to visit her family for Thanksgiving.

title: Tej Pratap Yadav Meets Lalu, Tejashwi, Invites Them For Dahi-Chura Feast
content: The meeting marked the first occasion in a long time when Tej Pratap and Tejashwi were seen together.

title: Over 2,500 Killed In Iran Protests, Activists Think Number "Conservative"
content: The number of dead climbed to at least 2,571 early Wednesday, as reported by the US-based Human Rights Activists News Agency. That figure dwarfs the death toll from any other round of protest or unrest in Iran in decades.

title: Multiple Americans Detained In Venezuela Released In "Peace" Gesture
content: The head of Venezuela's national assembly, Jorge Rodrguez, said that a "significant number" of Venezuelan and foreigners imprisoned in the country would be released as a gesture to "seek peace" following the military operation that deposed Maduro.

title: Abu Salem Can Be Released On 2-Day Parole: Government Tells Bombay High Court
content: Gangster Abu Salem, convicted in the 1993 serial bomb blasts case, is an "international criminal" and hence can be granted only two-day emergency parole with police escort, the Maharashtra government told the Bombay High Court on Tuesday.

title: Row Erupts In Kerala Over Halting Of Bridge Construction For 'Kumbh Mela'
content: A controversy has erupted in Kerala after revenue authorities issued a stop memo halting the construction of a temporary bridge on the Bharathapuzha river.

title: At Poll Rally, Abhishek Banerjee Presents 10 "Dead Voters" To Debunk SIR
content: Trinamool MP Abhishek Banerjee on Tuesday presented 10 more people, who were allegedly declared dead in the draft electoral rolls during the SIR in West Bengal, at a rally, and accused the Election Commission of taking away voting rights of citizens.

title: All About Muslim Brotherhood Branches Labelled Terrorist Organisations By US
content: The United States on Tuesday designated the Muslim Brotherhood branches in Egypt, Lebanon and Jordan as terrorist organisations, fulfilling a long demand of Arab allies and US conservatives.

title: After US, Israel Cuts Ties With Several UN Bodies
content: Israel's Minister of Foreign Affairs has decided that Jerusalem will immediately sever all contact with several United Nations agencies and international bodies, citing what the government described as persistent bias and actions hostile to Israel.

title: Haryana Bans Use Of 'Harijan', 'Girijan' In Official Communication
content: The Haryana government has asked all its departments, public and educational institutes and others to "strictly avoid" using the terms 'Harijan' and 'Girijan' in official communications in respect of Scheduled Castes (SCs) and Scheduled Tribes (STs).

title: Saudi Money, Pak Nukes, Turkish Military: India Takes Note Of 'Islamic NATO'
content: Turkey is in talks to become part of a Saudi Arabia-Pakistan security arrangement that resembles NATO's collective defence framework.

title: Delhi Police Arrest 2 More In Turkman Gate Violence, 20 Arrested So Far
content: Delhi Police on Tuesday arrested two other accused in the Turkman Gate stone pelting case, in which around 25-30 people pelted stones at police and MCD officials after they arrived at the spot with JCBs to demolish illegal encroachment near Mosque.

title: Trump Asked If He Wants To See Democracy In Iran. His Reply
content: As the protests continue to rise in Iran, US President Donald Trump on Tuesday warned the country of "consequences" if it continues violent actions against its own citizens, saying Tehran "better behave".

title: More Migrants Are Dying In US Immigration Custody Under Trump: Report
content: The confrontation tactics used by US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) have been in the spotlight since the fatal shooting of protester Renee Nicole Good in Minneapolis, Minnesota, on January 7.

title: Trump Says US Is "Bringing Venezuela Back", "Working Closely" On Oil Deal
content: US President Donald Trump on Tuesday (local time) said that the country is working "very well" with Venezuelan authorities as Caracas prepares to send millions of barrels of oil to American refineries.

title: 3 Killed After Coal Mine Collapses In West Bengal, Says BJP MLA
content: A coal mine collapsed in West Bengal's Asansol on Tuesday, leaving five people trapped under the debris.

title: Trump Says US Tariffs Bringing Billions To Treasury, Not Hurting Consumers
content: United States President Donald Trump on Tuesday (local time) said his administration's tariff policy is the cornerstone of what he described as the "strongest and fastest economic turnaround" in the country's history.

title: Costa Rica Says Plot To Kill President Uncovered Ahead Of Elections
content: Costa Rica's government on Tuesday said it had uncovered a plot to assassinate President Rodrigo Chaves on the eve of national elections, in which his right-wing party is tipped for victory.

title: Shun the mad race for material assets, develop a spiritual bent of mind: Justice Nagarathna
content: The Supreme Court judge penned her opinion while delivering a split verdict over the constitutionality of Section 17A of the Prevention of Corruption Act

content: Congress demands public disclosure about BJP-CPC closed door meetings; asks whether Chinese military support to Pakistan during Operation Sindoor was discussed

title: TTD introduces QR-based footwear management system at Tirumala
content: Devotees depositing footwear get a QR-coded slip containing details such as number of pairs, size, rack number, box number and exact storage location

title: Kolleru Lake comes alive as winged wonders descend

She specializes in health and heritage reporting, expertly simplifying complex health information to make it engaging and understandable for readers. Her deep dives into heritage topics are well-researched, resulting in captivating narratives that resonate with her audience. title: Orioles to debut Tupac Shakur bobblehead against Athletics
content: a prominent figure on the west coast rap scene, the legendary rapper moved to Baltimore from the Bronx in 1985 . he went to middle school and high school in Baltimore before moving to Marin City, Calif. in 1988 . on may 8th, we're celebrating the life and legacy of legendary rapper and actor Tupac Shakur .

title: Harsh orders needed to curb corruption in judiciary: SC
content: a court clerk made him sign a sale deed for a portion of his ancestral property . a civil judge gave orders to police to enforce the sale . the clerk threw out a woman and her three children from the house .

title: Gunshots heard during search op in Kathua; drones spotted in Rajouri
content: the area lies near Kamadh Nallah in Kahog forest belt, where an encounter had erupted on Jan 7 . two "drone-like objects" were spotted hovering over a village in Rajouri district . the cordon was fortified while troops continued hunting the ultras .

title: 'Take over your institutions': Trump urges Iranians to revolt; pledges help
content: the supremo directly encouraged a public uprising in Iran after imposing a blanket 25 per cent tariff on any country that continues to do business with the Islamic Republic . he posted on social media amid reports of a bloodbath in Iran following a crackdown on protests, unapologetically wading into Iranian internal affairs .

title: Will hold feeders liable, fix heavy compensation for dog bites, warns SC
content: the apex court asked dog lovers whether they can take responsibility in case of injury or death caused by stray dog bites . the court indicated that it will fix heavy compensation for victims . a bench of justices observed that peo was a dog lover and feeder .

title: College baseball 2026: Preseason top 25 and how to watch
content: all college baseball on ESPN, ESPN2, ESPNU, SEC Network, ACC Network, Big 12 Now on ESPN+, ESPN3, ESPN+ and ACCNX is available on the ESPN App . a team from the SEC has been dominating college baseball as of late .

title: India's import of Russian crude down 29% month-on-month in Dec: Report
content: AI image Atul Mathur is a Senior Assistant Editor at The Times of India with over 27 years of experience in journalism. Based in Delhi, he has spent much of his career reporting on governance, public policy and politics, churning out researched, data-driven stories that impact daily lives. Atul is known for investigative depth and strong human-interest narratives as he strives to bring clarity and context to complex issues. He currently tracks the energy sector, writing on power, renewable energy, coal and mines. title: State of the AL East: What's next for Yankees, Red Sox, Jays, Rays and O's
content: the defending AL champions have invested the most money in free agency this winter . the Boston Red Sox are the only MLB club yet to sign a free agent to a major league contract . however, the Baltimore Orioles have made significant trades to improve their roster .

title: 1 satellite survives PSLV rocket failure, transmits data from space for 3 mins
content: a football-sized spanish satellite called KID (Kestrel Initial Demonstrator) survived . the 25-kg satellite separated from PSLV's fourth stage . it transmitted "critical data" back to earth for about 3 minutes .

title: SIR scrutiny only for voter rolls, not deportation: EC
content: EC told a bench that scrutiny of citizenship was only meant to ensure deletion of non-citizens from electoral rolls . EC was entitled to inquire and conclude whether a person was an Indian citizen, allowing him to be a voter . no person with a shadow of doubt over citizenship could be included in the voter list .

title: SC moves to ensure 25% free seats for poor in all schools
content: rickshaw puller's child studies in a school alongside the child of a multi-millionaire or a judge . the apex court has initiated the exercise to ensure that all schools make available 25% free seats for children from poor and disadvantaged sections . justices P S Narasimha and A S Chandurkar said the RTE Act envisages elementary education for all children .

title: Women's AP Top 25 poll reaction: What to know about every team
content: the new AP top 25 women's college basketball poll is out . the rankings are out for the second time since the calendar turned to 2026 . a slew of upsets over the past week left just three undefeated teams .

title: College football buzz: What we're hearing about playoff expansion
content: a 16-team college football playoff format to begin as soon as 2026, sources say . there's still a stalemate between the two powerbrokers . the deadline for completing the format moved from Dec. 1 to Jan. 23, 2026 .

title: Can breakout star Leo Carlsson get the Ducks back on track?
content: leo Carlsson's goal in the shootout proves to be the difference for the Ducks . the 21-year-old forward was sitting second in league scoring with 10 goals and 25 points . he's got two goals and six points in his past 15 games . his most recent marker is in Anaheim's 5-3-1 win over the pennsylvania .

title: The resurgence of Vance Joseph: How former Broncos head coach has keyed the defense
content: Denver Broncos defensive coordinator Vance Joseph was 38 years old . his r√©sum√© includes coordinator gigs with the Miami Dolphins and the Arizona Cardinals . he had just completed six years as a defensive backs coach with the Texans .

title: Clips to Thunder, Pels to Hawks and more NBA draft assets to watch at the trade deadline
content: the Grizzlies are entertaining offers to potentially move Ja Morant before the trade deadline . the new york Knicks will get Washington's first-rounder if it falls outside of the top 8 . nearly half of the league's franchises don't control their pick .

title: NFL futures: Seahawks remain Super Bowl favorites; Patriots now AFC front-runner
content: The top two teams in the NFC West have the best odds to win the  Super Bowl . The  Seattle Seahawks  are the favorites to win Super Bowl 60, following closely by the division rival  Los Angeles Rams , who advanced to the divisional round with a win on Saturday.  The  New England Patriots  and  Buffalo Bills  are now the top two favorites in the AFC after advancing to the Divisional round on Sunday. The AFC West-winning  Denver Broncos  have the fifth-best odds to win the Super Bowl despite being the top overall seed in the AFC. They, like the Seahawks, had a bye in the first round. Here are the Super Bowl odds and conference championship odds for every team still in the hunt. Note: Odds by  DraftKings Sportsbook  and subject to change.

title: Another Hindu man killed in Bangladesh, 8th casualty since December 18
content: police say it appears to be a "pre-planned murder" in daganbhuiyan . the 28-year-old is the eighth to die since the lynching of garment factory worker dipu Chandra Das in mymensingh on Dec 18 . attacks on the minority community continue in the Muslim majority nation .

title: TGL best moments: Fowler, New York beat Jupiter Links
content: Jupiter Links took the green for the first time this season . the match took place at soFi center in Palm Beach Gardens, Fla . Tiger Woods and Tom Kim were inactive for Jupiter Links . Xander Schauffele was in action with a hammer throw from the bench .
